name: RISE (itch) (Wardius)
description:
RISE is a pixel-art game about escaping the void which tries to  consume you. 

The void will rise after every jump so you have to plan your way through each of the 18 levels carefully.

Discover various new gameplay elements the farther you go such as falling bricks, moving platforms and even lasers! 

Unlock fragments of a small story by collecting  books. There are  two different endings depending on how many books you collected.

The game mixes simple platforming with  puzzle mechanics and takes about 20-30 minutes to complete for the first time.

I am a 20 years old game design student from Germany and this is my first real game. It was made entirely by myself (design, programming, music and sounds) within 3 months.  You can play it for free or leave a small donation if you really want to. 

Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.

 I hope you have fun playing!
